name: Stealth Painter
description:
After a painter has his work rejected, he seeks vengeance by destroying important arts in the museum. You, as a frame restorer, have an obligation to repair them. But beware, the deceiver has left the museum guards extremely alert.

Game developed for Global Gamejam 2020.

Team:

  • André Luiz Alvares: Programmer;
  • Fabricio Vigneron: Programmer;
  • Felipe Marinho de Carvalho: Level artist.
  • Matheus: Level and Game Design;
  • Paulo Sergio Soares Junior: Programmer;
  • Tauã Amaro Pereira: Lead Artist;

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/conserta-quadros-7
